name: RTCRtpTransceiver.stop
description: The stop() method in the RTCRtpTransceiver interface permanently stops the transceiver by stopping both the associated RTCRtpSender and RTCRtpReceiver.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
